name: window-session
description: Save each window as a separate session, automatically.

scripts.icons:resize: cd resources/icon && convert icon.png -resize 16x16 icon-16.png && convert icon.png -resize 32x32 icon-32.png && convert icon.png -resize 48x48 icon-48.png && convert icon.png -resize 64x64 icon-64.png && convert icon.png -resize 128x128 icon-128.png && convert icon.png -resize 256x256 icon-256.png
scripts.tiles:resize: cd resources/tiles && convert tile.png -resize 1400x560^ -gravity center -extent 1400x560 tile-1400x560.png && convert tile.png -resize 920x680^ -gravity center -extent 920x680 tile-920x680.png && convert tile.png -resize 440x280^ -gravity center -extent 440x280 tile-440x280.png
